title: Crystal-Powered Train Station Adventure #65
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Station Maintenance Room
rooms.description: A dimly lit maintenance room beneath the train station. Pipes hiss with steam, and the walls are lined with tool racks and storage lockers. A faint blue glow emanates from crystal fragments scattered on a workbench. The air smells of oil and ozone.

items.name: metal tool rack
items.description: A rack holding various maintenance tools and equipment

items.name: heavy wrench
items.description: A large adjustable wrench, useful for mechanical work

items.name: storage locker unit
items.description: A set of metal lockers with three compartments

items.name: maintenance logbook
items.description: A worn notebook with daily maintenance records
items.text: Station Log: Crystal resonance frequency is critical. Platform 3 uses frequency 347 Hz. Engineer Tesla oversees all crystal operations. Remember: crystals are stored in the vault, the station master is Chief Conductor Morrison, and the locomotive runs on pure crystal energy.

items.name: brass storage key
items.description: A small brass key with a tag reading 'Crystal Storage'

items.name: cluttered workbench
items.description: A workbench covered with crystal fragments and technical diagrams

items.name: crystal power diagram
items.description: A technical schematic showing the crystal power system
items.text: CRYSTAL POWER SYSTEM: The station requires three power crystals to operate. Blue Crystal (cooling), Red Crystal (heating), Green Crystal (propulsion). All crystals must be installed in the control panel to activate the locomotive.

items.name: reinforced metal door
items.description: A heavy door leading up to the main platform level

rooms.name: Main Station Platform
rooms.description: A grand Victorian-era train platform with vaulted glass ceilings. Crystal chandeliers cast prismatic light across marble floors. A magnificent steam locomotive sits at the platform, its boiler cold and dark. Benches line the walls, and a ticket office stands to the east. Information boards display departure times.

items.name: departure information board
items.description: A large board listing train schedules and platform information
items.text: DEPARTURES: Express to Crystal City - Platform 3 - DELAYED. Engineer Tesla reports power crystal shortage. Contact Station Master Morrison for assistance.

items.name: wooden waiting bench
items.description: A polished wooden bench with ornate iron armrests

items.name: daily newspaper
items.description: Today's edition of the Crystal City Gazette
items.text: HEADLINE: Crystal Vault Security Enhanced! Station Master Morrison announces new security measures. The vault now requires knowledge of station operations to access. 'Only those who know our engineer, our storage location, and our station master may enter,' Morrison stated.

items.name: steam locomotive
items.description: A beautiful brass and steel locomotive with crystal power chambers visible through glass panels. Currently inactive.
items.text: The locomotive's nameplate reads 'Crystal Express'. Three empty crystal chambers are visible: one blue, one red, one green. All chambers must be filled to activate the engine.

items.name: locked crystal storage box
items.description: A reinforced box mounted on the platform wall, labeled 'Emergency Crystal Supply'

items.name: blue power crystal
items.description: A glowing blue crystal that pulses with cooling energy

items.name: ticket office door
items.description: An ornate wooden door with frosted glass panels leading to the ticket office

rooms.name: Station Ticket Office
rooms.description: A cozy office with a large wooden counter and walls covered in route maps and timetables. Filing cabinets line one wall, and a safe sits in the corner. The station master's desk is cluttered with papers and crystal samples.

items.name: wooden filing cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with multiple drawers containing station records

items.name: personnel records
items.description: Employee files for station staff
items.text: STAFF DIRECTORY: Chief Engineer - Nikola Tesla (Crystal Systems), Station Master - Chief Conductor Morrison (Operations), Assistant - Various. Tesla is responsible for all crystal maintenance and power distribution.

items.name: station operations manual
items.description: A comprehensive guide to station procedures
items.text: CRYSTAL STORAGE PROTOCOLS: All power crystals are stored in the secure vault located in the control room. Access requires proper authorization. The vault contains the red and green crystals needed for locomotive operation.

items.name: station master desk
items.description: A large oak desk covered with schedules, manifests, and crystal samples

items.name: handwritten note
items.description: A note in elegant handwriting
items.text: Reminder to self: The control room vault security questions are: Who is our chief engineer? Where are crystals stored? Who am I? - Chief Conductor Morrison

items.name: control room door
items.description: A heavy door with a brass plaque reading 'Station Control Room - Authorized Personnel Only'

rooms.name: Station Control Room
rooms.description: The nerve center of the train station. Banks of switches, gauges, and crystal-powered instruments line the walls. A large control panel dominates the center of the room, with three empty crystal slots. A secure vault is built into the far wall, its door covered with security questions.

items.name: main control panel
items.description: A complex panel with three crystal insertion slots labeled Blue, Red, and Green
items.text: CRYSTAL POWER CONTROL: Insert all three power crystals to activate the locomotive. Blue Crystal (cooling system), Red Crystal (heating system), Green Crystal (propulsion system). WARNING: All crystals must be installed before departure.

items.name: pressure gauge array
items.description: Multiple gauges showing various system readings, all currently at zero
items.text: All systems offline. Crystal power required for activation.

items.name: crystal vault
items.description: A reinforced vault with a sophisticated locking mechanism. Three security questions are displayed on a brass panel.

password_questions.question: Who is the chief engineer?
password_questions.hint: Check the personnel records in the ticket office

password_questions.question: Where are crystals stored?
password_questions.hint: The operations manual mentions the storage location

password_questions.question: Who is the station master?
password_questions.hint: Look at the newspaper and personnel files

items.name: red power crystal
items.description: A glowing red crystal radiating warmth and heating energy

items.name: green power crystal
items.description: A glowing green crystal humming with propulsion energy

items.name: platform access door
items.description: A door leading back to the main platform where the locomotive awaits

items.name: direct boarding passage
items.description: A passage leading directly to the locomotive once all crystals are installed in the control panel

rooms.name: Locomotive Engineer's Cabin
rooms.description: You've made it! The engineer's cabin of the Crystal Express is alive with power. The three crystals glow brilliantly in their chambers - blue, red, and green light mixing to create a dazzling display. Steam hisses, gauges spin to life, and the locomotive begins to move. Through the forward window, you see the tracks stretching toward freedom and adventure.

items.name: locomotive controls
items.description: A beautiful array of brass levers, crystal-powered gauges, and control wheels

items.name: active crystal chambers
items.description: Three glowing chambers containing the blue, red, and green power crystals, all operating at full capacity

items.name: cabin window
items.description: A large window showing the tracks ahead disappearing into the distance

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You've activated the Crystal Express and escaped the station! The three power crystals work in perfect harmony, propelling the locomotive forward. Steam billows, wheels turn, and the station fades behind you as you journey toward Crystal City and new adventures. The crystal-powered train carries you to victory! You win!
